wadi kala widuli bilen sochchamak adu karana bawata mewara mayi dinayada janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha porondu wuwada, ee poronduwa pawa hudek wadakarana janathawa rawatimata pinisa kiyu surangana kathawak pamanak bawa dan anawaranaya wemin pawathi.
enam warshikawa rupiyal laksha 5,50,000 kata aasanna mudalaki.
thaman itha ikmanin nawatha balaya allana bawata chandayata pasuda sita ma owuhu wahasi bas dodathi.
ehi prathipalada kotas kere.
upaya gath mudal api wetha genwa ganimedi kisidu gasthuwak gewimata natha.
